questions.questionTitle: How long will the fall spectacular last?
What does the speaker suggest that listeners do?

Children's coats are 25- to 40-percent off, and men's and women's ski parkas are 30-60 percent off. Need a new dishwasher? Mayday dishwashers are on sale for only $199. Or perhaps it's time for a new mattress? We have Sleep Sound king- and queen-sizes for just $95! Don't miss this year's Lacy's fall spectacular, now through Friday. Hurry in today!
